text: Nero are a British drum and bass/dubstep band from London, England that was formed in 2004. Its members include Dan Stephens, Joseph Ray and Alana Watson. They have co-produced one record for the rapper, Example. They have also supported Chase & Status. == Discography == === Studio albums === * Welcome Reality (2011) * Between II Worlds (2015) == Awards and nominations == Grammy Awards |- | align="center"| 2013 | "Promises" (Skrillex & Nero Remix) | Best Remixed Recording, Non - Classical | |- Year Nominee / work Award Result 2013 "Promises" (Skrillex & Nero Remix) Best Remixed Recording, Non - Classical Won Dubstep Music Awards North America |- | align="center"| 2012 | Nero | Best International Dubstep Act | |- Year Nominee / work Award Result 2012 Nero Best International Dubstep Act Won Ivor Novello Awards |- | align="center"| 2011 | "Promises" | Best Contemporary Song | |- Year Nominee / work Award Result 2011 "Promises" Best Contemporary Song Nominated Q Awards |- | align="center"| 2011 | Nero | Best New Act | |- Year Nominee / work Award Result 2011 Nero Best New Act Nominated Dubstep Music Awards (UK) |- | align="center"| 2011 | Welcome Reality | Best Album | |- Year Nominee / work Award Result 2011 Welcome Reality Best Album Won Drum & Bass Awards |- | align="center" rowspan="2"| 2011 | Nero | Best Dubstep Producers | |- | Nero | Best Dubstep DJs | |- Year Nominee / work Award Result 2011 Nero Best Dubstep Producers Won Nero Best Dubstep DJs Won Beatport Awards |- | align="center" rowspan="2"| 2010 | Nero | Best Dubstep Act | |- | "Act Like You Know" | Best Dubstep Track | |- Year Nominee / work Award Result 2010 Nero Best Dubstep Act Won "Act Like You Know" Best Dubstep Track Won Category:British Grammy Award winners Category:Musical groups established in 2004 Category:Musical groups from London Category:Musical trios Category:2000s British music groups Category:2004 establishments in England
title: Nero (band)
